title: Tips on playing against Certain Champs pls
body:
How do I play against

Mid lane Urgot in lane and in the mid game

Mid lane Swain in lane and mid to late game

Diana in any role AS the mid laner. Do I just roll over and cry if she gets fed?

Top lane Nasus AS the mid laner from mid to late game

Top lane Riven AS the mid laner. Do I just do same thing as I would with a fed Diana if Riven gets fed?

Tips and counterpicks/strong champion matchups would be incredibly well appreciated! I'll pray for all your souls!

replies.body:
Diana Counter - She uses so much mana that all you need to do is make her burn it, and ensure that if you wanna fight her you have backup nearby just incase she pops you like a diana can

Urgot/swain - IDK

Nasus - any apc and they have a nasus pick void staff over abyssal sceptre ignore his MR, thus he will build more and then your adc has the advantage, prevent him from farming malz does this really well

Riven - defensive APC build rylais, zhonyas etc.

Counter picks
Diana - any one with quick acting CC
Nasus - diana, malz, tank eater APC champs
Riven - No clue she's just a faceroll champ
I've actually been wondering, what ARE tank eating  mid lane AP champs? Obviously Urgot is the best AD Tank eater

> [{quoted}](name=TSM BjergWannabe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4IkJrxV1,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-04-15T05:17:34.116+0000)
>
> I've actually been wondering, what ARE tank eating  mid lane AP champs? Obviously Urgot is the best AD Tank eater

Anyone who does damage based on health or health % malz W does this, i only know him, also brand eats trhough swain if you keep him ablaze it acts like ignite but instead of true damage its magic damage, for any tank give them a liandries torment watch their health disappear

Yeah I guess Brand is a great tank eater and maybe just Void plus Liandry's for any super tanky front line

Kayle is another mid laner that's great at eating tanks! Just thought of her just then actually.

Mid lane Urgot in lane and in the mid game - Just autoattack him, Urgot is a useless champio nwho does nothing.

Mid lane Swain in lane and mid to late game - Ignite.

Diana in any role AS the mid laner. Do I just roll over and cry if she gets fed? - DOdge her Q.

Top lane Nasus AS the mid laner from mid to late game - DOn't let him farm.

Top lane Riven AS the mid laner. Do I just do same thing as I would with a fed Diana if Riven gets fed? - Why the fuck wasn't she banned?

Lol Urgot is really strong in the current tank meta because he shreds tanks stupidly well not only that but if he lands E on a carry it doesn't matter how far they stay back. They will get Qd and they will die. A good ult on a good target can also turn the tides of a battle

So Morellos and Ignite is like the only thing? If the Swain is fed enough it's seriously not enough

Yeah, I find that so hard to do tho, just gotta practice that I guess

I just wish my top laners knew this

100% agreed

> [{quoted}](name=TSM BjergWannabe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4IkJrxV1,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-14T23:11:10.659+0000)
>
> How do I play against
> 
> Mid lane Urgot in lane and in the mid game

you play like a bitch. because if not he'll stomp you.

> Mid lane Swain in lane and mid to late game

Poke him pre 6 as much as you can, take ignite, get your jungler to gank at >6 so he doesn't get ahead.
 
> Diana in any role AS the mid laner. Do I just roll over and cry if she gets fed?

yes, be careful of her level 6 spike. if she goes b and comes back with blasting wand or better she can and should all in you to chunk your hp or kill you.

> Top lane Nasus AS the mid laner from mid to late game

Let your adc deal with him lol. 

> Top lane Riven AS the mid laner. Do I just do same thing as I would with a fed Diana if Riven gets fed?

Yes, cc her, gapclose away from her, etc etc. although I'd say your adc should be more worried of her than you

A bitch as in like super safe? Just wait for ganks and get what cs is safe for me to get? And what about out of laning phase?

Sweet! That helps

What are some good matchups vs Diana then? And if she's jungle or top and I'm mid, the fuck do I do? Cry? Should I just start spamming Diana in Ranked? She seems ridiculously strong atm

Yah but what if they're not a tank killing adc? And they're on like the other side of the map lol

KK
